custom_item_2.description: 1.1 Set 'Turn on Enhanced Protected Mode' to 'Enabled'
custom_item_2.info: This control determines if Internet Explorer Enhanced Protected Mode is enabled.

custom_item_3.description: 1.2 Set 'Allow software to run or install even if the signature is invalid' to 'Disabled'
custom_item_3.info: installed or run by users even though the signature is invalid.

custom_item_4.description: 1.3 Set 'Prevent Bypassing SmartScreen Filter Warnings' to 'Enabled'

custom_item_5.description: 1.4 Set 'Prevent bypassing SmartScreen Filter warnings about files that are not commonly downloaded from the Internet' to 'Enabled'
custom_item_5.info: This control determines if Internet Explorer SmartScreen Filter warnings are enabled.

custom_item_6.description: 1.5 Configure 'Do not allow users to enable or disable add-ons'
custom_item_6.info: This policy setting allows you to manage whether users have the ability to allow or deny add-ons through Add-On Manager.

custom_item_7.description: 1.6 Set 'Disable Save this program to disk option' to 'Enabled'
custom_item_7.info: This policy setting prevents users from saving a program or file that Internet Explorer has downloaded to the hard disk.

custom_item_8.description: 2.1 Set 'Prevent per-user installation of ActiveX controls' to 'Enabled'
custom_item_8.info: This policy setting allows you to prevent the installation of ActiveX controls on a per-user basis.

custom_item_9.description: 2.2 Set 'Specify use of ActiveX Installer Service for installation of ActiveX controls' to 'Enabled'
custom_item_9.info: This policy setting allows you to specify how ActiveX controls are installed.

custom_item_10.info: This policy setting controls the ActiveX Filtering feature for websites running ActiveX controls.

custom_item_11.description: 2.4 Set 'Turn off ActiveX opt-in prompt' to 'Disabled'
custom_item_11.info: This policy setting allows you to turn off the ActiveX opt-in prompt.

custom_item_12.description: 2.5 Set 'Do not allow ActiveX controls to run in Protected Mode when Enhanced Protected Mode is enabled' to 'Enabled'
custom_item_12.info: This policy setting prevents ActiveX controls from running in Protected Mode when Enhanced Protected Mode is enabled.

custom_item_13.description: 3.1 Configure 'Prevent deleting websites that the user has visited'
custom_item_13.info: This policy setting prevents the user from deleting the history of websites that he or she has visited.

custom_item_14.info: This policy setting is used to prevent users from deleting cookies.

custom_item_15.info: This setting specifies the number of days that Internet Explorer keeps track of the pages viewed in the History List.

custom_item_16.description: 3.4 Set 'Days to keep pages in History' to '40'

custom_item_17.info: This policy setting is used to prevent users from deleting temporary Internet files.

custom_item_18.description: 3.6 Configure 'Allow deleting browsing history on exit'
custom_item_18.info: This policy setting allows the automatic deletion of specified items when the last browser window closes.

custom_item_19.description: 3.7 Set 'Prevent access to Delete Browsing History' to 'Enabled'
custom_item_19.info: This policy setting prevents the user from performing actions which will delete browsing history.

custom_item_20.info: This policy setting allows you to disable the InPrivate Browsing feature.

custom_item_21.description: 4.1 Configure 'URL to be displayed for updates:'
custom_item_21.info: This policy setting prevents the user from changing the default URL for checking updates to Internet Explorer and Internet Tools.

custom_item_22.info: This policy setting prevents the user from specifying the update check interval.

custom_item_23.description: 4.3 Configure 'Automatically check for Internet Explorer updates'
custom_item_23.info: This policy setting allows you to manage whether Internet Explorer checks the Internet for newer versions.

custom_item_24.description: 4.4 Configure 'Install new versions of Internet Explorer automatically'
custom_item_24.info: This policy setting configures Internet Explorer to automatically install new versions of Internet Explorer when they are available.
